attributes.action: only provide benefits to people who are in need of them and stop paying without the correct checks being carried out and check people who have not even worked a day in their lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Want the goverment stop looking at the people claiming that need it and start getting the benefit cheats that know the system and when they catch the cheats they need to get them to advise them of all the loop wholes so that other people can be caught.  I have paid tax ans insurance all my life and I am sick of seeing people enjoy not working when they can clearly work for a living.  Think the system should be more a guarantee to those who have already paid in and those that haven't need to prove that we need it.
